dateAndRelationship: 15 de noviembre de 2024, Daniel supervisaba directamente a Deiber
text: In the fast-growing world of technology, it's rare to encounter something or someone that makes you pause for a moment to appreciate the impact they will have on the future of tech. Deiber Verano is one of those people. He's a diamond in the rough; he's going to be an exceptional team lead soon. Deiber was a software developer who exceeded expectations of what it means to be an engineer, always seeking solutions at every opportunity, innovating, and being the MVP in every project he was involved in.
